title: Complete Java Backend Course
description: Master Spring Boot, REST APIs, and backend architecture with this full course.

sections.title: Getting Started
sections.description: This section will introduce you to the backend course setup.

chapters.title: Welcome to the Course
chapters.content: Let's get to know what you will learn and how this course is structured.

chapters.title: Development Environment Setup
chapters.content: In this chapter, we’ll guide you through setting up Java, IntelliJ, and Maven.

sections.title: Spring Boot Basics
sections.description: Learn the core building blocks of Spring Boot.

chapters.title: Spring Boot Introduction
chapters.content: What is Spring Boot and why is it so powerful?

chapters.title: Creating Your First API
chapters.content: Let’s build your first real API with Spring Boot.
